name: Magic The Gathering Online
notes:
The file path to the exe includes what looks like randomly generated folders and because of that Lutris can't set the exe for you. To do this manually you must open the Lutris Config window, select the Game options tab, click browse next to the executable field, and navigate to the exe located at:

<tt>$HOME/Games/magic-the-gathering-online/drive_c/users/$USER/AppData/Local/Apps/2.0/Randomletters/Randomletters/mtgo...tionRandomletters/MGTO.exe</tt>
content:
files:
- setup:
    filename: setup.exe
    url: http://mtgoclientdepot.onlinegaming.wizards.com/setup.exe
game:
  exe: null
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win32
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: corefonts dotnet452 ddr=gdi win10
    arch: win32
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win32
    executable: $setup
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
wine:
  version: 4.3-x86_64
